name: Half-Day Tour – 4 Hours
description:
See Barcelona in style on a four-hour private tour in a Saab 9-3 convertible and feel the wind in your hair as you are driven around some of the city’s picturesque neighbourhoods and landmarks, such as Pedralbes, Montjuïc, L’Eixample, Barceloneta, the Born and the shoreline.
The half-day tour starts on the hill above the city after I pick you up from the location of your choice.
